TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Binding extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts
Public MustInherit Class Binding Implements IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts

summary.span: 包含繫結項目，這些項目會指定用於用戶端與服務之通訊的通訊協定、傳輸和訊息編碼器。

span.span: Contains the binding elements that specify the protocols, transports, and message encoders used for communication between clients and services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示繫結項目的集合，集合中的每個繫結項目會分別描述端點如何與其他端點進行通訊，也就是一直在用戶端的通道處理站和服務的通道接聽程式 (Listener) 內建置端點。Represents a collection of binding elements, each of which describes an aspect of how an endpoint communicates with other endpoints and that are built, consistently, into a channel factory on the client and into a channel listener on the service. 繫結包含繫結項目的集合，這些項目會對應至通訊協定通道、傳輸通道和訊息編碼器。A binding contains a collection of binding elements that correspond to protocol channels, transport channels, and message encoders. 通訊協定通道的繫結項目可以是任意數目，但是每一個傳輸和訊息編碼器只能有一個繫結項目。There can be any number of binding elements for protocol channels but one and only one binding element for each the transport and message encoder. 通常在繫結中，會有六層的繫結項目。There are commonly six layers of binding elements in a binding. 只需要堆疊底部的傳輸和編碼繫結項目。Only the transport and encoding binding elements at the bottom of the stack are required. 因為每一個繫結都需要編碼方式，所以未指定編碼方式時，[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 就會為您新增預設編碼方式。Because an encoding is required for each binding, if an encoding is not specified, [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] adds a default encoding for you. 預設為 Text/XML (適用於 HTTP 和 HTTPS 傳輸) 和 Binary (適用於其他傳輸)。The default is Text/XML for the HTTP and HTTPS transports, and Binary for other transports. 下表摘要列出每一層的選項。The following table summarizes the options for each layer. |圖層Layer|選項Options|必要Required| |-----------|-------------|--------------| |異動流程Transaction Flow||否No| |可靠性Reliability||否No| |安全性Security|對稱、不對稱、傳輸層級Symmetric, Asymmetric, Transport-Level|否No| |形狀變更Shape Change||否No| |傳輸升級Transport Upgrades|SSL 資料流、Windows 資料流、對等解析程式SSL stream, Windows stream, Peer Resolver|否No| |編碼Encoding|文字、二進位、MTOM、自訂Text, Binary, MTOM, Custom|[是]Yes| |TransportTransport|TCP、具名管道、HTTP、HTTPS、MSMQ、自訂TCP, Named Pipes, HTTP, HTTPS, MSMQ, Custom|[是]Yes| 每一個繫結項目都會提供規格，以便在用戶端上建立通道處理站，並在服務上建立通道接聽程式。Each binding element provides the specification for building a channel factory on the client and a channel listener on the service. 例如，當建構通道處理站堆疊時，繫結中每一個繫結項目只會在堆疊中擁有一個通道處理站。When the channel factory stack is constructed, for example, there is one channel factory in the stack for each binding element in the binding. 相同類型的對應適用於服務上堆疊中的通道接聽程式。The same sort of mapping applies to the channel listeners in the stack on the service. 用戶端和服務上的一致性對於在這些端點之間建立通道型的連線非常重要。Consistency on the client and service is critical for establishing the channel-based connection between these endpoints. 然後，每一個處理站和接聽程式都會處理通道堆疊中與其連接之對應通道的傳送和接受作業，然後這些通道就可以傳送和接收用於通訊的訊息。Each factory and listener, in turn, processes the sending and accepting of the corresponding channels in the channel stack that connects them, and these channels can then send and receive the messages used to communicate. 的每一個執行個體都有 和 ，這兩者放在一起時可在服務的中繼資料 (Metadata) 內唯一識別此執行個體。Each instance of a has a and that together uniquely identify it in the metadata of the service. 如果未指定名稱或命名空間，[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 就會為您新增預設值。If no name or namespace is specified, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] adds a default values for you. 預設名稱是`null`和預設命名空間是http://tempuri.org/。The default name is `null` and the default namespace is http://tempuri.org/. 繫結的這個使用者名稱與通訊協定名稱的規格不同，後者是由 屬性所指定。This user name for the binding is distinct from the specification of the protocol name, which is specified by the property. 例如，如果您要新增更多 HTTP 繫結，您可以任意命名，並將其所有配置設定為 "http"。If you want to add more HTTP bindings, for example, you can name them whatever you want and set all of their schemes to "http". 沒有任何原有應用程式或機器分派是根據 。There is no inherent application or machine dispatch based on the . 因此，您可以避開無法為已知通訊協定註冊其他處理常式的常見問題。So you avoid the common problem of being unable to register additional handlers for well-known protocols. 您也可以輕鬆地並存使用多個版本的繫結，只需要為每一個版本提供不同的名稱即可。You can also easily work with multiple versions of a binding side-by-side by giving each version a different name. 類別會實作 介面來減少阻斷服務 (DOS) 攻擊情形，這類攻擊會長時間佔用資源。The class implements the interface to mitigate Denial of Service (DOS) attacks that rely on tying up resources for extended intervals of time. 此實作會指定通訊逾時值來開啟和關閉連接，並用於讀取和寫入與接收和傳送訊息有關的作業。The implementation specifies the communication timeouts values for opening and closing connections and for the reading and writing operations associated with receiving and sending messages. 用來取得及設定這些逾時值和其預設值之屬性的作業摘要列於下表中。The properties used to get and set these timeouts and their default values operations are summarized in the following table. |Timeout 屬性Timeout Property|預設值Default Value| |----------------------|-------------------| ||1 分鐘1 minute| ||1 分鐘1 minute| ||1 分鐘1 minute| ||10 分鐘10 minutes| 當您從 繼承來建立繫結時，必須覆寫 。When you create a binding by inheriting from , you must override . 此外，您也可以定義自己的繫結項目，並將其插入上表定義的任何層次之間。In addition, you can define your own binding elements and insert them between any of the defined layers in the preceding table. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UEBinding#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uebinding/cs/service.cs#11)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您想要檢查，`TChannel` 型別之通道的通道處理站可以在嘗試實際建置處理站之前，針對提供的 `context` 進行建置，請使用這個方法。Use this method if you want to check that the channel factory for channels of type `TChannel` can be build for the `context` provided before attempting to actually build the factory. 或者，請嘗試呼叫 來建置通道處理站並攔截產生的例外狀況 (如果無法建置的話)。Alternatively, try to build the channel factory by calling and catch the exception generated if it cannot be built.

summary.span: 在衍生類別 (Derived Class) 中覆寫時，會建立集合，此集合中包含屬於目前繫結之一部分的繫結項目。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, creates a collection that contains the binding elements that are part of the current binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這些項目不應該參考 物件使用的任何內部項目。The elements should not reference any internal elements that the object uses.

span.span: The that specifies requirements for the channel listener that is built.

summary.span: 從繫結堆疊的適當層次中，傳回要求的型別物件 (如果有)。

span.span: Returns a typed object requested, if present, from the appropriate layer in the binding stack.

returns.span: 要求的型別物件 (如果存在的話)，如果不存在則為 。

span.span: The typed object requested if it is present or if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果某個層次支援傳回要求的物件，它就會傳回物件。If a layer supports returning the requested object, it returns it. 如果不是，則會將呼叫向下委派到堆疊中的下一層。If not, it delegates the call down to the next layer in the stack. 如果到達堆疊的底部，而且沒有任何層次支援要求的物件，則該方法會傳回 `null`。If it gets to the bottom of the stack and no layer supported the requested object, then the method returns `null`.

Public Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定繫結的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the binding.
The name of the binding.
The default name is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的每個執行個體都具有 和 ，這兩者可一起在服務的中繼資料內唯一識別繫結的使用者名稱。Each instance of a has a and that together uniquely identify the user name for the binding in the metadata of the service. 繫結的這個使用者名稱與通訊協定名稱的規格不同，後者是由 屬性所指定。This user name for the binding is distinct from the specification of the protocol name, which is specified by the property. 例如，如果您要新增更多 HTTP 繫結，您可以任意命名，並將其所有配置設定為 "http"。If you want to add more HTTP bindings, for example, you can name them whatever you want and set all of their schemes to "http". 沒有任何原有應用程式或機器分派是根據 。There is no inherent application or machine dispatch based on the . 因此，您可以避開無法為已知通訊協定註冊其他處理常式的常見問題。So you avoid the common problem of being unable to register additional handlers for well-known protocols. 您也可以輕鬆地並存使用多個版本的繫結，只需要為每一個版本提供不同的名稱即可。You can also easily work with multiple versions of a binding side-by-side by giving each version a different name.

exception.span: 設定的值不能是 或空字串。

span.span: The value set cannot be or an empty string.

The default value is "http://tempuri.org/".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的每個執行個體都具有 和 ，這兩者可一起在服務的中繼資料內唯一識別繫結的使用者名稱。Each instance of a has a and that together uniquely identify the user name for the binding in the metadata of the service. 繫結的這個使用者名稱與通訊協定名稱的規格不同，後者是由 屬性所指定。This user name for the binding is distinct from the specification of the protocol name, which is specified by the property. 例如，如果您要新增更多 HTTP 繫結，您可以任意命名，並將其所有配置設定為 "http"。If you want to add more HTTP bindings, for example, you can name them whatever you want and set all of their schemes to "http". 沒有任何原有應用程式或機器分派是根據 。There is no inherent application or machine dispatch based on the . 因此，您可以避開無法為已知通訊協定註冊其他處理常式的常見問題。So you avoid the common problem of being unable to register additional handlers for well-known protocols. 您也可以輕鬆地並存使用多個版本的繫結，只需要為每一個版本提供不同的名稱即可。You can also easily work with multiple versions of a binding side-by-side by giving each version a different name.

span.span: The value set cannot be .

MemberSignature.Value: public TimeSpan OpenTimeout { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.TimeSpan OpenTimeout
Public Property OpenTimeout As TimeSpan

summary.span: 取得或設定針對連線所提供的時間間隔 (此連線要在傳輸引發例外狀況之前開啟)。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval of time provided for a connection to open before the transport raises an exception.

value.span: ，指定必須在逾時前多久完成開啟作業。預設值為 1 分鐘。

span.span: The that specifies how long the open operation has to complete before timing out. The default value is 1 minute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的值會由繫結之處理站所產生的通道和接聽程式所使用。The value of this property is used by the channels and listeners produced by the factories of the binding.

span.span: The value is less than zero or too large.

MemberSignature.Value: public TimeSpan ReceiveTimeout { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.TimeSpan ReceiveTimeout
Public Property ReceiveTimeout As TimeSpan
public: property TimeSpan ReceiveTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定連線中斷之前，可以維持非作用狀態的時間間隔 (在此期間未接收應用程式訊息)。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval of time that a connection can remain inactive, during which no application messages are received, before it is dropped.

value.span: ，指定應用程式在逾時之前多久必須接收訊息。預設值為 10 分鐘。

span.span: The that specifies how long the application has to receive a message before timing out. The default value is 10 minute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用可靠工作階段時，必須滿足兩個不同的無活動計時器，才能保持連線運作。When using a reliable session, there are two different inactivity timers that must be satisfied to keep the connection alive. 如果其中一個無活動計時器引發，就會中斷連線。If either of these inactivity timers goes off, then the connection is dropped. - 第一個無活動計時器在可靠的工作階段，稱為 。The first inactivity timer is on the reliable session and is called the . 如果在逾時期限內未收到訊息 (應用程式或基礎結構訊息)，便會引發這個無活動計時器。This inactivity timer fires if no messages, either application or infrastructure, are received within the timeout period. 基礎結構訊息是為了通道堆疊的其中一個通訊協定 (例如保持運作或通知) 所產生的訊息，而非包含應用程式資料的訊息。An infrastructure message is a message that is generated for the purpose of one of the protocols in the channel stack, such as a keep alive or an acknowledgment, rather than containing application data. - 第二個無活動計時器位於服務上，會使用繫結的 設定。The second inactivity timer is on the service and uses the setting of the binding. 如果在逾時期限內未收到應用程式訊息，便會引發這個無活動計時器。This inactivity timer fires if no application messages are received within the timeout period. 例如，這會指定伺服器關閉工作階段使用的通道之前，用戶端至少傳送一個訊息至伺服器所花的最長時間。This specifies, for example, the maximum time a client may take to send at least one message to the server before the server will close the channel used by a session. 這個行為可確保用戶端無法任意長時間地佔用伺服器資源。This behavior ensures that clients cannot hold on to server resources for arbitrary long periods. 因為其中一個無活動計時器引發便會中斷連線，因此當 大於 時增加前者沒有任何作用。Since the connection is dropped if either inactivity timer fires, increasing once it is greater than has no effect. 這兩個計時器的預設逾時都是 10 分鐘，因此在使用可靠工作階段時，一定要同時增加兩者，才會有所差別。The default for both of these timeouts is 10 minutes, so you always have to increase both of them to make a difference when using a reliable session. 如果在繫結或通道上啟用交易流程，執行作業所花的時間可能會比指定的逾時還要長。If transaction flow is enabled on the binding or the channel, the operation may take longer to execute than the specified timeout. 在這些情況下，此作業會因為超過逾時值而失敗，交易也會適當地中止。In these circumstances the operation fails due to the expired timeout and the transaction aborts appropriately. 安全性工作階段，搭配使用時繫結上設定的值也會做為工作階段逾時。When security is used with sessions, the value set on the binding is also used as the session timeout.

span.span: The value is less than zero or too large.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract string Scheme { get; }
.property instance string Scheme
Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Scheme As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ Scheme { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 在衍生類別中實作時，會設定 URI 配置，此配置可指定繫結所建置之通道和接聽程式處理站所使用的傳輸。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, sets the URI scheme that specifies the transport used by the channel and listener factories that are built by the bindings.

value.span: URI 配置，此配置會由目前繫結所建置之處理站建立的通道和接聽程式所使用。

span.span: The URI scheme that is used by the channels or listeners that are created by the factories built by the current binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繫結的這個使用者名稱與通訊協定名稱的規格不同，後者是由 屬性所指定。This user name for the binding is distinct from the specification of the protocol name, which is specified by the property. 的每個執行個體都具有 和 ，這兩者可一起在服務的中繼資料內唯一識別繫結的使用者名稱。Each instance of a has a and that together uniquely identify the user name for the binding in the metadata of the service. 例如，如果您要新增更多 HTTP 繫結，您可以任意命名，並將其所有配置設定為 "http"。If you want to add more HTTP bindings, for example, you can name them whatever you want and set all of their schemes to "http". 沒有任何原有應用程式或機器分派是根據 。There is no inherent application or machine dispatch based on the . 因此，您可以避開無法為已知通訊協定註冊其他處理常式的常見問題。So you avoid the common problem of being unable to register additional handlers for well-known protocols. 您也可以輕鬆地並存使用多個版本的繫結，只需要為每一個版本提供不同的名稱即可。You can also easily work with multiple versions of a binding side-by-side by giving each version a different name.

MemberSignature.Value: public TimeSpan SendTimeout { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.TimeSpan SendTimeout
Public Property SendTimeout As TimeSpan
public: property TimeSpan SendTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定針對寫入作業所提供的時間間隔 (此作業要在傳輸引發例外狀況之前完成)。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval of time provided for a write operation to complete before the transport raises an exception.

value.span: 指定必須在逾時前完成寫入作業之寬限時間的 。預設值為 1 分鐘。

span.span: The that specifies how long the write operation has to complete before timing out. The default value is 1 minute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在繫結或通道上啟用交易流程，執行作業所花的時間可能會比指定的逾時還要長。If transaction flow is enabled on the binding or the channel, the operation may take longer to execute than the specified timeout. 在這些情況下，此作業會因為超過逾時值而失敗，交易也會適當地中止。In these circumstances the operation fails due to the expired timeout and the transaction aborts appropriately.

span.span: The value is less than zero or too large.

span.span: Returns whether the name of the binding should be serialized.

returns.span: 如果繫結名稱應序列化，則為 ，否則為 。
